title: Double IP Weekend Is Not Working.
body:
Is it just me or is the double IP not showing when I finish a game

Also an IP icon doesn't appear next to my username

replies.body: People who were toxic, and got chat restrictions, didn't get the double IP (this included myself :( )

DOUBLE IP ??
 WHERE

i must of missed something
working for me. there is no icon, its the blue ip on the right hand side after a game. Normally without a boost it is grey, with a boost active it is blue.
Not weekend yet? Maybe that or im at work on Saturday and missed my shift yesterday?
It does state the 28th of november in the announcement, which is today. I think they're just going off NA time and haven't told us... Again...
